hero.clear_content: I wanted to create an interface in which I could organize and share all my different projects and creations!
hero.share_content: You can interact on some projects by posting comments.
hero.up_to_date_content: Feel free to keep an eye on the latest projects by joining my newsletter via the contact form!

education.title: education
education.subtitle: Because it all starts with education!

IMAC.name: IMAC
IMAC.content: “I am currently studying in a creative engineering school for 3 years. This is the IMAC for Multimedia Audiovisual and Communication Engineer.”

FAC.name: Nantes University
FAC.content: “I spent 2 years learning mathematics and physics in preparatory class, as well as a 3rd year in physics license where I took a break in the second semester to specialize in programming.”

about.title: about
about.subtitle: Let's quickly talk about this little boy!
about.content: French engineering school student in Champs-sur-Marne (Paris), I'm passionate about digital creation. Between development, drawing, video, or animation, I like to bring my ideas to life through different technologies.

tools.title: tools
tools.subtitle: I work with different software and programming languages to design my different works!

contact.title: contact
contact.subtitle: Need a service or you want to follow my works? No problem!
